content:
I completely understand! The extra legroom and priority boarding in Delta Comfort+ will definitely make a big difference, especially after a frustrating experience on your previous flight.

It's great that you're prioritizing your comfort and willingness to redeem a few more miles for a better experience. You deserve it!

Now that you've decided on the Delta Comfort+ seat, I recommend booking your ticket as soon as possible to secure your spot. Availability can change quickly, and you don't want to miss out on your preferred seat.

Before you book, double-check the following:

1. **Redemption rate:** Make sure you have enough SkyMiles to redeem for the Delta Comfort+ seat. If you're short on miles, you might need to earn more or consider alternative redemption options.
2. **Flight details:** Verify the flight number, departure and arrival times, and travel dates to ensure they match your plans.
3. **Seat selection:** Once you book, log in to your Delta account to select your seat. You can choose from available seats in the Delta Comfort+ section.

Once you've booked and secured your seat, you can start looking forward to a more comfortable and relaxing flight experience!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy booking, and I hope you enjoy your flight to Miami!
